The claim was based on a screenshot of a: based Twitter user, which was published in January 2021.
The post: s caption mentioned that the UK government had blocked the Office for National Statistics (ONS) from releasing data on deaths and side effects related to the Covid-19 vaccination.
The UK: s Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA) is responsible for publishing data on adverse reactions to Covid-19 vaccinations, not the ONS. The MHRA's reports, based on the Yellow Card System, have recorded over 300 deaths following Covid-19 vaccinations, but there is no evidence to suggest that the vaccine caused these deaths.
